motion.title: Interference/collision may be recognized in advance before prototyping by outlining the motions of the real product, and it can be used as a reference manual when executed by unskilled personnel.
motion.context: Based on the model completed with high-precision 3D object modeling and rendering, review interference/collision by conducting motion simulation of the real product prior to producing a prototype. The final simulation can be turned into a video for technical training or promotional purposes.
